dict.acceptation: 实施，执行；使生效，实现；落实（政策）；把…填满；
工具，器械；家具；手段；[法]履行（契约等）；

sent.orig: Plugins are allowed to register new actions dynamically to implement to implement their functionalities.
sent.trans: 插件允许动态的注册新的动作去实现他们自己的功能。

sent.orig: Because implement militaristic policy, external aggressive, make economic height militarization, implement regulatory economy.
sent.trans: 由于实行军国主义政策，对外侵略，使经济高度军事化，并实行统制经济。

sent.orig: The basic method applies Langrange interpolation techniques in time-domain to implement a secrecy fragmentation-reconstruction scheme.
sent.trans: 基本方法是在时域上应用拉格朗日插值技术实现秘密分割－重构方案。

sent.orig: DG obtained the highest appraisal of Lean implement, simultaneously, received many precious suggestions by the visitors.
sent.trans: 各个小组对东莞厂在精益生产方面的执行给予了高度评价，并提出很多宝贵意见。

sent.orig: The nodes implement function by adopting host-guest in testing instantaneous field.
sent.trans: 瞬态场的测试节点采用上、下位机模式实现其功能。
